body: Serpentfolk high priests are the leaders of their people.
name: Serpentfolk High Priest

sections.ac: 28, touch 13, flat-footed 25 (+8 armor, +3 Dex, +4 natural, +3 shield)
sections.special_attacks: channel negative energy 10/day (DC 22, 5d6), scythe of evil (5 rounds, 1/day), weapon master (10 rounds/day)
sections.melee: +3 unholy light mace +24/+19/+14/+9 (1d6+6), bite +16 (1d6+3 plus poison)
sections.other_gear: +2 breastplate, +1 heavy steel shield, +3 unholy light mace, mwk light crossbow with 10 bolts, amulet of natural armor +1, belt of incredible dexterity +2, headband of inspired wisdom +2, pearl of power (1st), phylactery of faithfulness, silver unholy symbol, spell component pouch, 1,434 gp
sections.languages: Aklo, Common, Draconic, Undercommon; telepathy 100 ft.

spells.spell-like abilities:
(CL 4th; concentration +9)

At will-disguise self (DC 16, humanoid form only), ventriloquism (DC 16)

1/day-blur, dominate person (DC 20), major image (DC 18), mass suggestion (DC 21), mirror image, suggestion (DC 18), teleport

spells.domain spell-like abilities:
(CL 10th; concentration +16)

9/day- battle rage (+5), touch of evil (5 rounds)

spells.cleric spells prepared:
(CL 10th; concentration +16)

5th-flame strike D (2, DC 21), righteous might, slay living (DC 21)

4th-cure critical wounds, divine power, freedom of movement, spit venom (DC 20), unholy blight D (DC 20)

3rd-cure serious wounds, dispel magic, invisibility purge, magic circle against good D, protection from energy

2nd-bear's endurance, calm emotions (DC 18), darkness, dread bolt (DC 18), hold person (2, DC 18), spiritual weapon D

1st-bane (DC 17), forbid action (DC 17), murderous command (2, DC 17), protection from good D, shield of faith (2)

0 (at will)-bleed (DC 16), detect magic, resistance, stabilize

D domain spell; Domains Evil, War

sections.feats: Combat Casting, Extra Channel, Great Fortitude, Improved Channel, Improved Initiative, Selective Channeling, Toughness, Weapon Finesse

sections.body: Before Combat A high priest prepares for battle by casting divine power and freedom of movement, then uses its scythe of evil ability to enhance its weapon.
sections.name: Tactics
Special Abilities
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Serpentfolk/Example Serpentfolk/Serpentfolk High Priest/Serpentfolk High Priest/Special Abilities

sections.body: Bite—injury; save Fort DC 17; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1d2 Str; cure 2 saves. The save DC is Constitution-based.
sections.name: Poison
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Serpentfolk/Example Serpentfolk/Serpentfolk High Priest/Serpentfolk High Priest/Special Abilities/Poison

sections.name: Serpentfolk High Priest
sections.skills: Acrobatics +7 (+3 when jumping), Diplomacy +15, Disguise +10, Escape Artist +15, Intimidate +10, Knowledge (arcana, nobility, planes) +9, Knowledge (history) +10, Knowledge (religion) +15, Perception +21, Sense Motive +15, Spellcraft +15, Stealth +11, Use Magic Device +15
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Serpentfolk/Example Serpentfolk/Serpentfolk High Priest/Serpentfolk High Priest
sections.combat_gear: potion of aid, wand of cure moderate wounds (10 charges)
